underlying_goal: Complete Tasks #2, #3, #4: add ruff linter configuration to aqua.yaml, create ruff.toml, integrate into Taskfile and GitHub Actions CI, and run ruff to fix existing code
friction_detail: Ruff version 0.15.0 from WebFetch was incorrect and the version prefix 'v' caused installation failures; also the ruff.toml had `builtins` misplaced under `[lint]` instead of top-level, and `src` ended up under `[format]` section initially.
brief_summary: Team lead delegated three tasks (ruff config, CI integration, code linting) which Claude completed successfully despite version lookup errors and config placement issues.
